summary: Literature is a vast world of written and spoken words, from novels and poems to plays and essays. It's an art form that entertains and teaches us about life. Literature includes stories, both real and imagined, and can be found in books, online, or even in songs. The word comes from the Latin for "learning and writing." Over time, literature has grown to include digital works and even movies. It's a way to explore new worlds, understand different perspectives, and appreciate the beauty of language.
title: Literature
